entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late in the evening then clearing. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
